snippet: The recent heat wave raises the question, again, of whether extreme weather can be attributed to human-induced climate change. The answer is yes.
abstract: Editorial attributes the heat wave that has afflicted much of the United States to human-induced climate change; observes that the United Nations Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change has warned that climate change will result in more frequent and potentially more damaging extreme weather events.
lead_paragraph: The recent heat wave raises the question, again, of whether extreme weather can be attributed to human-induced climate change. The answer is yes.

headline.seo: The Heat Wave and Global Warming
